Name: enobrev
AboutMe:
Best Hacks

I built a video rendering system prototype based on node.js, which eventually became the C++ based rendering backend for Cameo 1.0.

I also built a self-healing shared-nothing file-processing system which automatically scaled to handle thousands of video and image uploads per minute

Professional Experience

Ten years of remote freelance / consulting doing general web and backend development, and four years working remotely with a startup that created Fast Society, a group communication app, and Cameo, a video editing app, which was purchased by Vimeo in 2013.

Besides Cameo, my more well known projects include the LA Chamber Orchestra the Free Music Archive, and On-Camera Audiences.
